page.title: 13SCIENCE/TECHNOLOGY IN DUNS.
page.content: TECHNOLOGY IS USED WIDELY IN HEALTH, HOME LIFE, EDUCATION, BANKING, BUSINESSES & INDUSTRY. INDUSTRY USES ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED MACHINERY. HOMES HAVE MODERN LABOUR SAVING DEVICES, ELECTRONICALLY ASSISTED CAMERAS & COMPUTER GAMES. SCHOOL TECHNOLOGY IS MODERN.IN{INDUSTRY } HOMAC FISH PROCESSORS USE TECHNOLOGY IN THE PROCESSING & FREEZING OF FISH FOR EXPORT TO EUROPE. HAMISH MORISONS HATCHERY IS ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED FROM THE FUMIGATION OF EGGS FROM THE FARMS, THROUGH INCUBATOR CONTROL TO HATCHING, COUNTING & DESPATCH OF CHICKS TO BRITAIN & ABROAD. THEY WERE THE FIRST IN BRITAIN TO COUNT & PACKAGE CHICKS ELECTRONICALLY. AN EMERGENCY ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED TELEPHONE SYSTEM IN CASE OF MACHINE FAILURE IN OFF DUTY HOURS ALERTS EMPLOYEES AT HOME.
